name: Stellata Waterway
description:
An endless runner heavily inspired by the hoverboard levels from Klonoa 2 and retro PlayStation graphics. 

If you go for a high score, I'd love to hear what you got in a comment!
My best is 432343.

Controls

  • WASD to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • K / Left-Click  to Hit
  • P / Right-Click to Recall Star
    (Pointer shows which star will be recalled next.)
  • R to Restart

Scoring

  • Colorful stars grant more points. 
  • Stars gain color each time they're hit, granting more and more points. 
  • Each spiraling star boosts overall point gain.
  • As your score increases, you gradually move faster and faster, changing how obstacles need to be traversed.

Note: For some reason, the browser version only saves your score after you press R to play again.

  • https://www.models-resource.com/playstation_2/klonoa2lunateasveil/model/47339/

  • https://freesound.org/people/EVRetro/sounds/519072/
  • Various SFX from Klonoa 2 https://forums.untamedheart.us/?topic=765.0

Music

  • Deep Ocean - A-zu-ra
    https://battleofthebits.org/arena/Entry/Deep+Ocean.mp3/34902/ 
    (slightly sped up, slightly pitched down, and edited to loop)

Made in one week for Prototype Studio at the NYUGC, using the animation below as inspiration.
